name: Condolence
description:
Controls:

JUMP - X / Up Arrow
MOVE -  Arrows / AD
ATTACK - C / SPACE / Ctrl

To reset all data press I + O on the house scene.

 Game created for the La //TODO Game Jam #1. Temática: "ESO NO ME LO ESPERABA"

  • Created by:
    • Kevin Lagos: @KevsDev
    • Andrés Roncancio: @AndiRoncancio
    • Daniel Ramos Instagram - @Todwitz
